Articles.Content:
Hi, I am quite new to modding (i understand the basics), but I've done Blender before (a lot) so I want to know if there is an available version of the stock parts as .blend file, or if it is possible to extract the .mu files (with texture), since one of my planned projects is a variation on the mk2 command pod

thank you

kamik423

there are no stock meshes available for download due to copyrights. there is a mu importer for blender that allows you to pull things out for personal reference. you can also create empty Internal.cfg file for a particular part and spawn it in Unity via Part Tools
